DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this cluster randomised trial is to investigate whether the Yhteispeli whole school programme is effective in improving children's socio-emotional skills and mental health and socio-emotional skills. All Finnish elementary schools and their classes in 1-3 grades were invited to participate in the study. The schools were randomly allocated to receive either Yhteispeli programme or two lectures
DOC.brief_title: Yhteispeli - Effectiveness Study on Promoting Childrens' Socio-emotional Skills in School
DOC.criteria: All children from volunteering elementary schools and classes (grades 1 to 3) whose parents gave consent to participate
